    • Uses of PlayerColor in connectFour

      Methods in connectFour that return PlayerColor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PlayerColor Game.getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns the current PlayerColor
      PlayerColor Board.getField(int index)
      Gets the PlayerColor of a field index
      PlayerColor Board.getField(int row, int col)
      Gets the PlayerColor of the pair (row,col)
      PlayerColor[] Board.getFields()
      A getter for the PlayerColor[] fields.
      Methods in connectFour with parameters of type PlayerColor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Board.checkForFreeSpot(int col, PlayerColor color)
      Checks if the spot in a column is free so it drops completely down.
      void Board.countDiagonalLeft(int row, int col, PlayerColor color)
      Counts all the diagonal fields from right up to left down from the given pair (row,col) that are the PlayerColor that is given and connected
      void Board.countDiagonalRight(int row, int col, PlayerColor color)
      Counts all the diagonal fields from left up to right down from the given pair (row,col) that are the PlayerColor that is given and connected
      void Board.countHorizontal(int row, int col, PlayerColor color)
      Counts all the horizontal fields up and down from the given pair (row,col) that are the PlayerColor that is given and connected
      void Board.countVertical(int row, int col, PlayerColor color)
      Counts all the vertical fields left and right from the given pair (row,col) that are the PlayerColor that is given and connected
      boolean Board.gameOver(int row, int col, PlayerColor color)
      Checks if the game is over, so if there is a winner or if the Board is full
      boolean Board.isWinner(int row, int col, PlayerColor color)
      Checks if the given PlayerColor is a winner
      void Board.setField(int row, int col, PlayerColor color)
      Sets a field on the Board with the given pair (row, col) in the color given
      void Board.setField(int index, PlayerColor color)
      Sets a field on the Board with the given index in the color that is given
